alert.note: Alert for Lafayette; Lower Iberia; Lower St. Mary; Lower Vermilion; St. Landry; Upper Iberia; Upper St. Martin; Upper Vermilion (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 27 at 1:10AM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT IBERIA...SOUTHEASTERN LAFAYETTE...NORTHWESTERN ST. MARY...EASTERN VERMILION AND ST. MARTIN PARISHES THROUGH 200 AM CST... At 110 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over St. Martinville, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lafayette, New Iberia, Abbeville, Catahoula, Breaux Bridge, St. Martinville, Jeanerette, Freshwater City, Intracoastal City, Pecan Island, Avery Island, Broussard, Youngsville, Erath, Delcambre, Henderson, Loreauville, Butte La Rose, Lydia, and Acadiana Regional Airport. This includes Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 113 and 128. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Lafayette; Lower Iberia; Lower St. Mary; Lower Vermilion; St. Landry; Upper Iberia; Upper St. Martin; Upper Vermilion
